RecoveryMailBody:
＜Applying for Data Recovery＞
In order to identify your account and verify your identification, please let us know the following information.
*Please write ""N/A"" for items that are unknown.
Please do not delete the template text entered in the email.
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
■Reason for the data recovery
(e.g., lost data transfer code, unable to transfer data even after entering the data transfer code and password, etc.)

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
○The account information that you wish to recover
■Player Name:
■Rank:
■Player ID:
■The Device Model Name:
 (*Please answer by model number, such as iPhone 8/SO-01L, etc.)
■The name of the member you have set in your profile (e.g. Rinku Aimoto/Sunny◎Showtime):
■Total number of diamonds you have (both paid and free):
■Have you ever purchased items or diamonds from the Diamond Shop?:
■(If you have purchased before) Date of purchase:
■(If you have purchased before) The price and name of the item or diamond you paid for:
＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
【How to Check Past Charges】
■If you are using iOS device
1. Select ""Settings"" > ""Account Name"" > ""Media & Purchases"" > ""View Account"".
2. Tap ""Purchase History"" > ""Total Billed and check the ""Order""
*If you send us a screenshot of your billing history, we will be able to verify your identification more smoothly.

■If you are using an Android device
1. Access pay.google.com.
2. Look for ""More Purchase History"".
3. Select ""View Purchases"".
4. Select the order for which you want to see a receipt.
*If you send us a screenshot of your billing history, we will be able to verify your identification more smoothly.
＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
■Date the app was installed:
■Date of last log-in to the app:
■Mileage Rank:

【Attention】
・When inserting an image, please insert it at the bottom of the body of the email (below the application version.)
・If you cannot identify the account you wish to recover, or if we cannot determine that you are the person who used the account in question, we may not be able to recover the data.
・Please note that it may take time to complete the data recovery process.
ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
